resources.string:
Display a toast message "Turbo Charger Connected" on supported devices when a supported charger is connected and the system recognized it as a "Turbo" charger**
Supported chargers: Motorola Turbo Charger (or any Qualcomm QuickCharge 2.0 charger).
**If using a supported charger on a supported device and there is no Toast use the "Do a Toast Test" below to test yours current charger type
The USB cable can make a difference, use original (or high quality USB cables)
Display a toast message \u0022Charge %\u0022 with the current battery percentage value when the charger is unplugged
In case you don\'t see the \u0022Turbo toast\u0022, Click here to see a Toast with your current Charging type.\nIf it is not \u0022Turbo\u0022 will be no toast upon connection
This is a open source app check it on my github\ngithub.com/bhb27/turbotoast
